origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnergyAPI.get_global_trends', 'description': 'This function provides global trends in the energy industry based on the specified focus.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to focus on, e.g., Energy, Technology.'}, {'name': 'focus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical or sector focus, e.g., global, renewable.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'A list of current trends in the specified industry and focus.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnergyAPI.get_global_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'Energy', 'focus'是'global'.
